title: T. De Witt Talmage; As I Knew Him
author: Talmage, Eleanor McCutcheon
snippet: And yet he remembered also thosewho for any reason could not join in the merriment of the holidays. Tothose I recommend Whittier's poem, in which he celebrates the rescue oftwo Quakers who had been fined L10 for attending church instead of goingto a Quaker Meeting House, and not being able to pay the fine were firstimprisoned and then sold as slaves, but no ship master consenting tocarry them into slavery they were liberated.
